p: The hydroalcoholic extracts of the leaves of Rhamnus prinoides and Dodonaea angustifolia, and root barks of Brucea antidysentrica were screened for the presence of secondary metabolites like alkaloids, saponins, flavonoids, terpenoids, phenols, and tannins according to standard tests described [ 47, 48, 49, 50]. The specific tests for the phytochemicals were done as follows.
